body_html:
Hi @wangshuaizs,
I don't see your ROCE configuration while running the job.
It is not enough to use --ps_hosts=10.10.10.6:2222 --worker_hosts=10.10.10.5:3333, those are for the GRPC network, for the ROCE you need to set the env variable of the RDMA_* (see verbs README)
body_text:
Hi @wangshuaizs,
I don't see your ROCE configuration while running the job.
It is not enough to use --ps_hosts=10.10.10.6:2222 --worker_hosts=10.10.10.5:3333, those are for the GRPC network, for the ROCE you need to set the env variable of the RDMA_* (see verbs README)
body:
Hi @wangshuaizs, 
I don't see your ROCE configuration while running the job.
It is not enough to use --ps_hosts=10.10.10.6:2222 --worker_hosts=10.10.10.5:3333, those are for the GRPC network, for the ROCE you need to set the env variable of the RDMA_* (see [verbs README](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/README.md))
